original_text: Thou shouldest not have entered into the gate of my people in the day of their calamity; yea, thou shouldest not have looked on their affliction in the day of their calamity, nor have laid hands on their substance in the day of their calamity;
korean_text: 내 백성이 환난을 당하는 날에 네가 그 성문에 들어가지 않을 것이며 환난을 당하는 날에 네가 그 고난을 방관하지 않을 것이며 환난을 당하는 날에 네가 그 재물에 손을 대지 않을 것이며

sentences.original_text: Thou shouldest not have entered into the gate
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그 문으로 들어가지 아니했어야 했다

sentences.original_text: in the day of their calamity
yea, thou shouldest not have looked
in the day of their calamity
in the day of their calamity
